title: The After Show Wonders Whether Someone Would Date a Cigar Smoker
itunes:title: The After Show Wonders Whether Someone Would Date a Cigar Smoker
description:
This week, we talk about whether people are less likely to date a cigar smoker. Do potential partners avoid cigar smokers?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
